column3: This iconic Pima cotton mesh Polo shirt is designed with a relaxed silhouette and features our signature embroidered Big Pony at the left chest. Ribbed Polo collar. Two-button placket. Short sleeves with ribbed armbands. Uneven vented hem. 100% Pima cotton. Machine washable. Imported. Model is 5'10"/178 cm and has a 32" bust. She wears a size small.
column4:
The Pink Pony Campaign is Ralph Lauren Corporation's worldwide initiative in the fight against cancer, supporting programs for screening, early diagnosis, treatment, research, and patient navigation.
Our mission is to reduce disparities in cancer care in medically underserved communities and ensure that treatment is available at an earlier, more curable stage.
Globally, 25% of the purchase price of Pink Pony products is directed to an international network of local charities.
To learn more, please visit RalphLauren.com/PinkPony.
